entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Light snow ending early this evening then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 7 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Tuesday 03 January 2023
